title: [Large-Scale] Teacher Professional Development Program in Life Skills-Centered Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in physical education and at least two years of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Flexible Learning Structure for Working Professionals to Balance Work and Study, Operating Real-Time Collaboration Platforms Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Students demonstrate the ability to design physical education lessons incorporating life skills elements at 80%+ participation rates
Learners improve instructional execution strategies at least 3 times through feedback from peer teachers
Learners analyze professional development progress through 10+ reflective journaling sessions on online platforms

resources: Daily Living Skills Education Materials Package

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
